jobDescription: Job Description A successful candidate will work in a dynamic, team-oriented environment to improve genomic analysis consumable devices that enable leading-edge medical research. This scientist will be a key contributor within the Product Test Group working with multidisciplinary teams to facilitate on-going product development activities across Illumina platforms.
